title: FULLY_CHARGE_NITROUS
content:
0x1A2BCC8C636F9226// FullyChargeNitrous
void FULLY_CHARGE_NITROUS(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle whose nitrous system is to be fully recharged.NativeDB Introduced: v3095Recharges the nitrous system of the specified vehicle to its maximum capacity. This action sets the nitrous charge duration to the maximum limit defined by previous settings applied through SET_OVERRIDE_NITROUS_LEVEL.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if vehicle == 0 then return end

-- Set nitrous modifications with SET_OVERRIDE_NITROUS_LEVEL since this native require a durationMod to be specified.
SetOverrideNitrousLevel(vehicle, true, 1.5, 2.0, 0.5, false)

-- After setting the modifiers, fully recharge the nitrous system to the new max defined.
FullyChargeNitrous(vehicle)
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for FULLY_CHARGE_NITROUS
FullyChargeNitrous(vehicle)
